## Criterion.Level.A type

All criteria of level A.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type A<V extends Version = Version.Recommendation> = Of<"A", V>;
```
<b>References:</b> [Version](./alfa-wcag.criterion_namespace.version_typealias.md)<!-- -->, [Version.Recommendation](./alfa-wcag.criterion_namespace.version_namespace.recommendation_typealias.md)

## Remarks

Note that criteria levels are different from conformance levels! While criteria levels are disjoint, conformance levels stack.
